mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodGodEvlSize Generator(Generator) 2018-04-19 */ GOD_NO , GOD_EVL_TURN , MBR_SIZE_CD , SIZE_VAL , SIZE_UNIT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_GOD_EVL_SIZE WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_EVL_TURN = #{godEvlTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND MBR_SIZE_CD = #{mbrSizeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
